pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lightweight Access to the 'Geospatial Data Abstraction Library' ('GDAL') // Provides low-level access to 'GDAL' functionality for R packages. 'GDAL' is the 'Geospatial Data Abstraction Library' a translator for raster and vector geospatial data formats that presents a single raster abstract data model and single vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported formats https://gdal.org/.
